bug.author: danrovito
bug.description:
My runner keeps telling me Invalid Workflow File Here is what I'm using <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Kurbyio/Kurby/blob/1.0/.github/workflows/issue_label_bot.yaml>https://github.com/Kurbyio/Kurby/blob/1.0/.github/workflows/issue_label_bot.yaml</denchmark-link>
It looks right to me. Just need a second pair of eyes.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.77. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/machine-learning-apps/Issue-Label-Bot>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/danrovito>@danrovito</denchmark-link> the problem appears to be your file is in the wrong directory - it should be in not (the latter is reserved for GitHub Actions), and this project is a GitHub App unrelated to GitHub Actions
